subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Germany’s Bundesliga champion Borussia Dortmund held on for a 2-1 win over visiting Real Madrid on a day of upsets in the Champions League on Wednesday.
snippet: Germany’s Bundesliga champion Borussia Dortmund held on for a 2-1 win over visiting Real Madrid on a day of upsets in the Champions League on Wednesday.
